mapper.update:
UPDATE cb_process_node
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
client_id = #{clientId},
process_id = #{processId},
node_id = #{nodeId},
name = #{name},
pre_node_id = #{preNodeId},
next_node_id = #{nextNodeId},
type = #{type},
node_logic = #{nodeLogic},
runner_flag = #{runnerFlag},
next_runner_org = #{nextRunnerOrg},
status = #{status},
runner_user_id = #{runnerUserId},
runner_post_id = #{runnerPostId},
runner_depart_id = #{runnerDepartId},
runner_usergroup_id = #{runnerUsergroupId},
runner_org_level = #{runnerOrgLevel},
is_multiselect = #{isMultiselect},
is_other_man = #{isOtherMan},
is_assign_man = #{isAssignMan},
is_revoke = #{isRevoke},
is_fallback = #{isFallback},
WHERE id = #{id}
